channel.description: ok i have to find something about the oddysey that reflects something in todays life so if somone can give me a song name that has something to do with the oddysey like the sires i heard there were a few songs about but i cant find. anyways help is appriciated :p

item.title: The oddysey
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

It may be a little stupid, but in the Odyssey, Odysseus relates to a movie star. Steven Spielberg got the I\idea of the Character Indiana Jones from Odysseus. So in fact, Odysseus and Indiana Jones are one in the same. Btw, idk if Indiana Jones was by Spielberg, so tell me if I’m wrong.

Read full topic
